CommonFields.Title: Junction-Controlled Elasticity of Single-Walled Carbon Nanotube Dispersions in Acrylic Copolymer Gels and Solutions
Author: Schoch, Andrew B.
Shull, Kenneth R.
Brinson, L. Catherine
CommonFields.Location: Material Science and Engineering Department and Mechanical Engineering Department, Northwestern University, Evanston, Illinois 60208, USA

Mixing.Description: The solution is suspended in a sonication bath at 70 °C, sonicated for at least 75 min.
cooled under continued sonication until the temperature of the bath reaches a value close to room temperature.

Raman_Spectroscopy.Description: with a double excitation-side and a single emission-side monochromator

Rheometery.Description: with a double gap Couette fixture and a Peltier heating/cooling element
Rheometery.Equipment: Anton Paar Physica Modular Compact Rheometer 300
